CustomField.description: A sort order must be specified in order to include the news on the PRM homepage. To remove a news item from the homepage, remove this value. If multiple news items have a sort order, they will all be displayed in the order specified by this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A sort order must be specified in order to include the news on the PRM homepage. To remove a news item from the homepage, remove this value. If multiple news items have a sort order, they will all be displayed in the order specified by this field.
CustomField.label: Sort Order
